channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Processed Foods: What to Eat, What to Skip
item.description: From frozen veggies to packaged snacks, processed foods aren't all created equal. Learn how to tell the difference and spot healthier options.

item.description: Do you really know what's in your air?

item.title: Have Foot Pain? Here's How To Fix Plantar Fasciitis In Just 15 Minutes
item.description: There may be more factors at play than just the tissue on the bottom of your foot.

item.title: The New Era of Women’s Gut Care: Why Diversity Is the Key to a Thriving Microbiome

item.title: These 3 Zodiac Signs Are Prone To Anger Issues — Is One Yours?
